extension_app_description: A Chrome extension that provides real-time blocking of explicit graphics and content.
mobile_app_description: Trend Micro Family Digital Awareness/Digital Wellbeing apps to assist in youngster’s digital habits.
portal_banner_title: Optimize your Social Media Privacy and Security Settings
portal_title: <bold>__appName__</bold> checks your current privacy settings and recommends the best settings to help keep you and your family safe.
checkup_email_description: Provide the email address that you want Trend Micro to send the results to.
checkup_credential_description_scan: Provide your __platform__ account and password to allow Trend Micro to check your settings.
checkup_credential_description_apply: Provide your __platform__ account and password to allow Trend Micro to change your settings.
checkup_credential_note: NOTE: Trend Micro does not save your account or password after this one-time scan.
checkup_progress_bar_description_scan: This might take a few minutes. You can wait for the results or check your email later to find out what we found.
checkup_progress_bar_description_apply: This might take a few minutes to complete.
report_gray_info_description: After checking your __platform__ settings, we found the following:
report_gray_info_description_suggestion: See the collapsed report above to make changes to your account or click the red "Apply Recommended Settings" button on the top to let us do it for you.
report_critical_issue_found_singular: 1 critical privacy and security setting found
report_critical_issue_found_plural: __number__ critical privacy and security settings found
report_suggest_action: Protect your account now by quickly applying the recommended settings.
report_promotion_description: If you like what you see, please install and open Trend Micro Family app on your device to find the pairing code. <hrefLearnMore>Learn more</hrefLearnMore>
report_promotion_referral: Here’s a referral link that you could share with your friends to give it a try:

page.title: __platform__ Privacy and Security Setting
page.message: We encountered an unexpected error.  Please try again
page.report_expired_message: Please go back to the main page to re-run the scan to get a new report.

messages.unassociated_account: This is not the account associated with. Try again.
messages.invalidated_security_code: That security code did not work. Please type the code again.

button.go_to_index: Go Back to Trend Micro Family

application_2fa.title: Login Request Sent
application_2fa.message: A notification was sent to the trusted devices for this account. If you already logged in using another device, you can open __platform__ app and approve this request.

emailPhase.declare_policy: By checking this box, I certify that I am the parent with sole custody or have obtained consent from all other custodians and I agree to all the terms of <hrefEU>EULA</hrefEU> and <hrefPolicy>privacy policy</hrefPolicy>

securityCode.description: Additional security is required for this account. Please type the one-time passcode.
